results.title: Exploring the Pharmacological Potential of Metformin for Neurodegenerative Diseases
results.text_hl: Elsewhere, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ can improve the learning and memory capacity and @<m>DISEASE_Neurologic_Manifestations</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009461 @@@neurological dysfunction@@@ of APP/@GENE_PSEN1 @GENE_19164 @@@PS1@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ by reducing @GENE_APP @GENE_11820 @@@Abeta@@@. obtained the same conclusion that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ facilitated learning and memory capacity in @CELLLINE_CVCL:4564 @@@SAMP8@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ by reducing APPC99 and pTau proteins.

results.title: The development and benefits of metformin in various diseases.
results.text_hl: Herein, we summarized the benefits of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in four types of diseases, including @DISEASE_Metabolic_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D008659 @@@metabolic associated diseases@@@, @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@cancer@@@, aging and @DISEASE_Osteoporosis @DISEASE_MESH:D010024 @@@age-related diseases@@@, @<m>DISEASE_Neurologic_Manifestations</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009461 @@@neurological disorders@@@.

results.title: The Role and Mechanism of Metformin in the Treatment of Nervous System Diseases.
results.text_hl: Recent studies highlight @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@'s ability to cross the blood-brain barrier, stimulate neurogenesis, and provide beneficial effects in specific @<m>DISEASE_Neurologic_Manifestations</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009461 @@@neurological disorders@@@ through diverse mechanisms.

results.title: Lentiform fork sign in a uremic patient after inadvertent exposure to metformin.
results.text_hl: Clinicians should be aware of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-induced @DISEASE_Brain_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D001927 @@@encephalopathy@@@, presenting with relevant medication history, @<m>DISEASE_Neurologic_Manifestations</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D009461 @@@neurological symptoms@@@, and the lentiform fork sign.
